item.title: Wedding Festivities Under the Sacred Tree
item.description: A vibrant Warli painting showing villagers celebrating a wedding with dancers around a large sacred tree, featuring traditional earthy tones and geometric figures.
item.materials: Digitally printed on high-quality, eco-friendly wallpaper with fade-resistant inks.
